name: Square Tower
description:
In a dark world where magic is sealed.

We need to rescue the princess trapped in the tower. 
Join us on the brave journey!

[The main feature of the game]

- Korean, English support
- Randomly generated towers of varying sizes
- More than 20 weapons
- Bossing on every 10th floor
- More than 20 species of monsters.
- so-called self-styled heroes who appear randomly. 
- Reinforcement system through materials
